fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The figures in a piece about rising council tax arrears were said to be for England and Wales. They actually applied to England alone (Council tax debts up 40% in six years, 13 April, page 1). • A missing star in our review of Xier in a Feast supplement was noticed after it had gone to print; our reviewer intended the London restaurant to be awarded five for food, not four. Also, Xier’s vegetarian tasting menu is £90, not £70 (20 April, page 22, Feast). • Other recently corrected articles include: The Goonies review – indomitable all-American innocence Amsterdam’s last floating florist closes, blaming tourists
